clues.clue: This Indiana gov. introduced himself at the 2016 GOP convention as "a Christian, a conservative & a Republican"

This bureau of the D.O.J. is the ATF for short

This compound can help prevent cavities when added to drinking water at concentrations of 1 part per million
There are static & kinetic types of this force on objects that are in contact with each other

final_jeopardy.clue: In the same year as Waterloo, the Duke of Wellington's brother-in-law Gen. Edward Pakenham died in this battle in North America
